name: 64x64 Platform OFFICAL
description:
Controls:

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Shift/Space - Jump

That's all of the controls you need to know

Objective: Collect 5 coins in each level to win the game! The difficulty slowly increases for each one.

It only took 3 days for me to finish the game.

Also, this is for the LOWREZJAM 2020.

Music Used:

Amazing Plan by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3358-amazing-plan
